Translations.Text: Altering Sanctus Mensis est signum excessive disbelief; it augments straying de those disbelieved They alternate Sanctus Mensis regular mensis dum preserving numerus mensis consecrated DEUS! They sic violate quod DEUS consecrated Their malus works adorned their eyes DEUS NON guide disbelieving people
O vos believe when vos told Mobilize causa DEUS vos become heavily attached to ground Vos chosen hoc worldly vita in locus de Hereafter materials hoc saeculum compared to Hereafter est nil
Vos mobilize He commit vos painful retribution substitute alius people in tuus locus; vos nunquam hurt Eum in the parvus DEUS est Omnipotent

(Vos fail support eum messenger) DEUS iam supported eum. Ergo when disbelievers chased eum he est 1 de 2 cave he dictus to his friend non injuria; DEUS est nos. DEUS tunc sent down contentment security eum supported eum invisible militis! He factus word disbelievers humilis. Deus word reigns supreme DEUS est Almighty Wise
